metadata.description: When young Teddy Chance stumbles upon a strange, otherworldly object while out exploring, so begins a night of peril and excitement that will alter the course of his entire life. Written by Samuel Read (Exit Generation) and illustrated by Alex Cormack (Oxymoron, Future Proof), FIND is an all-ages adventure about the power of curiosity and inspiration, and how comic books really are universal.
metadata.name: Find
